metadata.title: CVE-2018-13251 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In libming 0.4.8, there is an excessive memory allocation attempt in thereadBytes function of the util/read.c file, related toparseSWF_DEFINEBITSJPEG2. Remote attackers could leverage thisvulnerability to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted swf file.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
